welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Maintal, Germany! Experience our charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, rich culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Maintal has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
